name: CLKComplicationTemplateGraphicCircularOpenGaugeImage
desc: A template for displaying a full-color circular image, an open gauge, and text.

items.name: init(gaugeProvider: CLKGaugeProvider, bottomImageProvider: CLKFullColorImageProvider, centerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider)
items.desc: Creates a new template that has an open circular gauge, a small image at the bottom, and a small amount of text in the center.

items.name: var bottomImageProvider: CLKFullColorImageProvider
items.desc: The image to display at the bottom of the gauge.

items.name: var centerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text to display in the center of the gauge.

items.name: var gaugeProvider: CLKGaugeProvider
items.desc: The gauge to display in the complication.
